alert.note: Alert for Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 12 at 5:53PM MST until December 14 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow with significant blowing and drifting snow expected to begin early Tuesday. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph, with gusts 35 to 45 mph near the Campbell County line. * WHERE...Southern Johnson County. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible at times. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, including on Interstate 25. Whiteout conditions are likely at times.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
